subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Amazing,
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
That's what keeps me hooked.

F-S

On Sat, Jan 8, 2011 at 9:46 PM, <SnowfireL@...> wrote:

>
>
> *Don't know how you guy's feel, but I still marvel at all of this, I went
> to turn off the box tonight, and I just said, "God Bless" to them, and I got
> back a man's voice clearly repeating back to me, "God Bless"  in a soft
> smooth tone, yet so clear it was as if he were in the same room as I.   It
> still shakes me, these people are dead folks, they are dead,
> dead people, that seem very much still alive some where, and isn't it
> wonderful to know that we do live on too?  I still cannot get over how
> amazing, this communication. it is like having a great dream become
> alive!  sf*
>
> 
>

Tha 's wha keeps me hooked.  
 
F-S
